fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: ID_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: EVENT_INTEN
fields.doc: height of the peak in the sky-image plane [cnts]

fields.name: EVENT_PHI
fields.doc: phi orientation of GRB/Transient wrt BAT instrument [deg]

fields.name: EVENT_THETA
fields.doc: theta orientation of GRB/Transient wrt BAT instrument [deg]

fields.name: TRIGGER_DUR
fields.doc: intgration time of the image from which these peaks were extracted [sec]

fields.name: SOLN_STATUS
fields.doc: flag bits  See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined

fields.name: IMAGE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: significance level of the peak in the FFT image plane [sigma]

fields.name: CATALOG_NUM
fields.doc: catalog number for sources that match a known source in the on-board catalog

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
